profile_setup.validation_bio_max: Bio must be less than 500 characters

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.no_notifications_description: You'll receive important updates and notifications here
notifications.no_educational_description: We'll send you helpful tips about lending and borrowing

home.profile_completion_description: Your profile is {{percentage}}% complete. Complete it to get better matches!
home.welcome_description: Connect with {{role}} who match your criteria. Build trust, negotiate terms, and create successful lending relationships.
home.step1_description: Add your information to build trust with potential matches
home.step2_description: Browse and filter to find the perfect lending partners
home.step3_description: Send connection requests and start conversations
home.step4_description: Discuss and agree on loan terms that work for both parties
home.lender_tip1: • Review borrower profiles carefully before connecting
home.lender_tip2: • Set clear interest rates and repayment terms
home.lender_tip3: • Use the messaging feature to ask questions
home.lender_tip4: • Start with smaller amounts to build trust
home.borrower_tip1: • Complete your profile to increase trust
home.borrower_tip2: • Be clear about your borrowing needs
home.borrower_tip4: • Be honest about your repayment ability
